June 9, 2013 D Graubünden Kantonales Musikfest (Fourth Section)
Graubünden Kantonales Musikfest (Fourth Section) 40 Set Test and Own Choice Graubünden Kantonales Musikfest graubunden-kantonales-musikfest-fourth-section
None Switzerland
Fourth
Triptych [Waespi]
Chur, GR, Switzerland The draw was an overall draw, covering all brass band and non brass band sections, numbering up to 76 on this occasion. These 8 bands were categorised as fourth section brass bands. See http://www.chur2013.ch/wettbewerbe/angemeldete-vereine-provisorisch/
June 10, 2013, 2 p.m. June 10, 2013, 2:52 p.m.
1 Jugend Brass Band Imboden Gian Stecher High Flyers
2 Jugendmusik Jenaz Simon Bühler Cambridgeshire Impressions
3 Musikgesellschaft Obersaxen Benjamin Moser Adventures In Brass
4 Musikverein Schmitten Selina Gruber A Festival Overture [Fernie]
5 Musica Instrumentala Savognin Adrian Farrér Pacific Dreams
6 Musikgesellschaft Vals Damian Tomaschett Cityscapes [de Haan]
7 Musikgesellschaft Madrisa Klosters-Dorf Leo Ticar
Unknown Result Societad da musica Danis/Tavanasa Unknown
